meanings.definition: A person who designs or studies the efficiency and comfort of a person's working environment.
meanings.sent1: The ergonomists at the office helped improve my chair for better back support.
meanings.sent2: The team of ergonomists conducted a study on how to reduce strain in the workplace.
meanings.sent3: The ergonomists joked that they needed a more ergonomic coffee machine to boost productivity.
meanings.sent4: The ergonomists were like detectives, solving the mystery of workplace discomfort.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the ergonomists who transformed my workspace into a cozy haven.
